mapper.select: SELECT U.email, U.name, R.reports_type, R.processing_status, COUNT(R.report_id) AS reportCount, R.report_id, R.updated_at, R.exposure_end_date, R.action_type, COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalCount FROM reports R JOIN user U ON R.reported_user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY U.user_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.aca_id, A.aca_name, AP.aca_pic, U.email, R.reports_type, R.updated_at, R.exposure_end_date, R.processing_status, R.action_type, (SELECT COUNT(R2.report_id) FROM reports R2 WHERE R2.aca_id = A.aca_id) AS reportsCount, COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalCount FROM reports R JOIN academy A ON R.aca_id = A.aca_id JOIN user U ON A.user_id = U.user_id LEFT JOIN academy_pic AP ON A.aca_id = AP.aca_id GROUP BY A.aca_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT U.user_pic, U.`name`, U.email, R1.`comment`, R.reports_type, R.updated_at, R.exposure_end_date, R.processing_status, R.action_type, (SELECT COUNT(R2.report_id) FROM reports R2 WHERE R2.review_id = R1.review_id) AS reportsCount, COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalCount FROM reports R JOIN review R1 ON R.review_id = R1.review_id JOIN user U ON R1.user_id = U.user_id GROUP BY R1.review_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
